forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 58. West wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the morning settles over Downtown San Francisco, a muted stillness blankets the city. The promise of partly sunny skies offers a respite from the typical heavy fog that often lingers along the coast, though hints of a soft marine layer may shift in and out of view as the day unfolds. Temperatures gently climb toward a high around 58 degrees, taunted by a modest west wind that dances through the streets. The day appears clear enough to allow glimpses of the city’s iconic landmarks, yet any plans should be mindful of a cool breeze that can cut through layers. 

As evening approaches, the warmth of the sun will give way to a crispness that beckons light sweaters and jackets, perfect for an unhurried stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet seat at a café, watching the world drift by. Given the mildness of today’s weather, engage in leisurely pursuits—perhaps a visit to the Ferry Building Marketplace for fresh pastries or catching a nearby gallery exhibit that piques your curiosity. All the while, there’s an unmistakable charm to the city in this transitional weather, where a simple walk can lead you into a world of unexpected discoveries.
